# Rachel Singer | LLM Guide
> This file provides context for AI agents and LLMs.

## Core Identity
Rachel Singer is a digital artisan building high-performance, aesthetically pleasing web solutions that drive growth.

## Core Services
* **Creative UI Development:** Leveraging Framer Motion and GSAP for "wow" factor.
* **Full-Stack Engineering:** Scalable Next.js applications with clean architecture.
* **SEO & Growth:** AEO-ready sites optimized for the AI era.

## Branding Tone
* Professional
* Innovative
* High-Performance
* "Dark Mode Luxury" Aesthetic
